pros: BENEFITS Merdian has unbelievable benefits pay is ok but the real reason is healthcare low out of pocket cost and nearly everything covered
cons: Dont call out dont get sick dont get hurt on job just dont. can lose job at any moment even workers comp cases

job_title: Manager of Respiratory Care in Neptune, NJ
pros: Great people & brand recognition. Location is good, well respected in community! Only health care organization in central nj. All aspects of respiratory is delivered from cradle to grave.
cons: Flat organizational structure on call 24/7. Stressful lack of leadership support to deliver initiatives. Lack of safe staffing standards. Need to be a hands on leader and wear many hats from processing equipment, clerical support, patient care, environmental services to cleaning floors!

job_title: Staff Physical Therapist for Home Health in Totowa, NJ
pros: You will never be bored during your workday & you have great flexibility in tailoring treatment programs for each client.
cons: Although compensated for mileage, you may be required to travel as much as 70 miles a day depending on your area. This tends to make for a very long day- when you are full time, you are required to go anywhere needed, including out of your regular zone. Weekends & holidays are mandatory

pros: Every day brought a new adventure. New patients, fun atmosphere. It was clean. Got yearly jackets or backpacks. Didn't have to travel far from home to get to work.
cons: Company caters to bullies, and is discriminatory.  "You know what happens to whistleblowers",  so don't be the one to tell management you are being harassed.

review_title: Steady income, but very high expectations
pros: Local employer with many locations to choose from.  Stable income, not high, but steady.
cons: Very high expectations for low salaries across the board.  Work/life balance is marketed, but not a reality.  60+ hour week managers advised making family a priority instead of job, and must work more.

review_title: Working at Meridian has given me the base I needed to give the best care possible.
job_title: RN Case Manager in Wall, NJ
pros: Meridian truly strives to give their employees the opportunity to grow.
cons: They push past the point of reasonable time line to complete the task at hand due to not enough support.

pros: OT always available.  Units pull together as a team and support each other.
cons: purposeful short staffing.  budget blah blah blah

job_title: ER Patient Care Technician in Manahawkin, NJ
pros: People are very friendly, management cares about its employees. Clean hospital plenty of education to further your career. Easy process to transfer to other departments or hospitals within their system.
cons: PD workers do not get more money or raises or increase in salary. NEVER and HR fails to let you in on that important detail upon hire. So take the part-time or full-time job

pros: Excellent benefits...health dental eye and much more. 4 weeks vacation...and much more also lot good amount of overtime.
cons: Coming to work is must in any kind of snow storm or even a hurricane...if you don't want to drive in bad weather u have to u have to stay at the hospital the night or the day before so you can be there for your shift.

pros: Friendly/helpful staff, lots of room for moving up the chain(BHT,CNA,LPN,RN,DON,etc.), staff performs great team work most of the time, lots of good training, paid holidays even if you don't work, lots of opportunity for overtime!
cons: Short staffed quite frequently/:

pros: it is a very good company and i feel that I can grow and earn from this experience so far.
cons: i think management does not get the feedbck it should from the people who are working at the bottom

review_title: Good company, BUT choose any location except Red Bank

Benefits: dental ,vision, and health
Large company with the ability and help to grow

review_title: Meridian is a great company  to work for

pros: All the staff and departments works well together.  As an employee I felt  as though my efforts mattered and appreciated, the company culture is great.
cons: I don't really have any cons to provide.  Meridian has been a fantastic employer.

pros: Great clinical teams and great nursing culture. Good relationship with nursing schools. Good place to learn nursing. Good trauma centerl.
cons: water fall develpment. Slow to get new ideas approved. Clinical teams face frustraiton at times but push through it. More overtime needed.

review_title: Great sales training, awful experience dealing with change of management.

cons: Hostel change of management, outdated sales outreach

review_title: Very good workplace - can get hectic at times, but overall a great place to work.

pros: Decent medical insurance however the more team members we acquire, one would think the premiums would be lower, however,  thats not the case

pros: Great benefits and good PTO

pros: Fantastic Insurance benefits which are a must in this day and age.  Company is very good to employees.

pros: Meridian Health Systems is an excellent company to work for because everyone works very well as a team.

pros: None. They want you to work for free.

pros: Enjoy the chance to grow and excel

pros: Meridian offers excellent medical benefits as well as dental and vision.
